name: AVCaptureFileOutputRecordingDelegate
desc: Methods for responding to events that occur while recording captured media to a file.

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, didStartRecordingTo: URL, from: [AVCaptureConnection])
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the output has started writing to a file.

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, willFinishRecordingTo: URL, from: [AVCaptureConnection], error: Error?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the output will stop writing new samples to a file.

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, didFinishRecordingTo: URL, from: [AVCaptureConnection], error: Error?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when all pending data has been written to an output file.

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, didPauseRecordingTo: URL, from: [AVCaptureConnection])
items.desc: Called whenever the output is recording to a file and successfully pauses the recording at the request of a client.

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, didResumeRecordingTo: URL, from: [AVCaptureConnection])
items.desc: Called whenever the output, at the request of the client, successfully resumes a file recording that was paused.
